markdownRemark.html: An art museum in Malaga that focus mainly on 19th-century Spanish painting, predominantly Andalusian, based on the collection of Carmen Cervera, the third wife of Baron Hans Heinrich Thyssen-Bornemisz

frontmatter.title: Carmen Thyssen Museum
frontmatter.description: Carmen Thyssen Museum - An art museum in Malaga that focus mainly on 19th-century Spanish painting, predominantly Andalusian, based on the collection of Carmen Cervera, the third wife of Baron Hans Heinrich Thyssen-Bornemisza.
frontmatter.price: General 10.00 euro, Reduced 6.00 euro, Group	8.00 euro
